content: heart is now complete ©ashleymaglich there is so much potential for this heart pattern here are some ideas off the top of my head but please let your imagination take hold i can t wait to see what you create *table runner place mats bags doll blankets/rugs i m sure you can attach them for a cute throw blanket sew them onto other blankets or hoodies use smaller hooks & embroidery thread for applique size or possibly earrings & ornaments… i hope you enjoyed this pattern head on over to my youtube channel for video tutorials of my patterns as well as other craft things ©ashleymaglich
